ygData.subject: Re: Decepticon Conflict
ygData.msgSnippet: As Soundwaves cassette port opens, a silver cassette, and a blue cassette follow the red one. The blue one begins to spiral in mid air, then transforms, legs

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

As Soundwaves cassette port opens, a silver cassette, and a blue
cassette follow the red one. The blue one begins to spiral in mid air,
then transforms, legs and arms extending, as does his head while he
begins to flip in mid air, landing on the ground, and recoiling from the
impact, as two laser cannons appear on his back. The blue robot standing
at about four feet simply looks up to Soundwave.

The silver cassette alsoe unfolds, but this time horrizontally, as a
tail, and four legs emmerge. It lands on it's new pair of legs, and
turns around, showing a a pair of red cannine eyes overtop of a muzzle
with glissening rasor sharp teeth. Guns begin to form over top of each
leg. The wolf like cassette simply begins to pace in front of Soundwave,
snarling quietly.
